title: Get the list of added URL properties under an ad account

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: url_property_info_list
fields.description: Information about the URL properties that have been added.

fields.name: property_type
fields.description: Type of the URL property. Enum valuesï¼š 1: Domain. 2: URL prefix.

fields.name: url
fields.description: An owned URL that is added.

fields.name: property_status
fields.description: Verification status of the URL property. Enum values: 0: Pending for verification. 1: Verified. 2: Not verified because the verification attempt failed. You need to re-verify the URL property.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: Signature string to be used in the ownership verification process.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Signature file name to be used in the ownership verification process.
